text: wajaeal almushrikun lilah -jll wela- jz'ana mimaa khalaq min alzrwe walthmar wal'aneam yuqadimunah lldywf walmsakyn, wajaealuu qsmana akhar min hadhih al'ashya' lishurakayihim min al'awthan walansab, fama kan mkhssana lishurakayihim fa'iinah yasil 'iilayha whdha, wala yasil 'iilaa allh, wama kan mkhssa lilah taealaa fa'iinah yasil 'iilaa shrkayhm. bis hakam alqawm wqsmthm
